Traits.Name: Evasive Movement
Traits.Content: Le Loyon can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see when it is hit by an attack, making it difficult to pin down.

Traits.Name: Aura of Dread
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 10 feet of Le Loyon must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Dreadful Whispers
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, dealing 10 (2d6 + 3) psychic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Soul Bind
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +4 to hit, dealing 5 (1d10) necrotic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

Actions.Name: Illusory Terrain (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
Actions.Content: Le Loyon creates an illusory copy of the environment for 1 minute in a 30-foot radius. All creatures that enter the affected area must succeed on a DC 12 Intelligence saving throw or become disoriented, causing them to move in random directions until the effect ends.

Actions.Name: Evasive Shadow
Actions.Content: Le Loyon can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on one attack roll made against it. To do so, the creature must see the attacker. If the attack misses, Le Loyon can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet.
